abstract:
With massive speed and scale of data, online multiplayer games are one
of the most natural verticals for data science applications. At Riot
Games, we have a company-wide mandate to design every approach with a
focus on improving the player experience. This talk will discuss the
unique challenges of data at scale in gaming, how we make decisions, and
how we continue to evolve the team to meet player needs.
